page.title: 13THE AVENUES, 2.
page.content: The members look after the grass verges and the{Victorian}fountains. They have erected seats for people to sit on while they are out walking. Here and there in the area are new, modern houses. Also in the area are several hotels for people to stay in for a short period of time. Some of the houses are being converted into old peoples homes. In recent years the drains have been dug up and replaced because they were old and cracked. Also the roadshave been re-surfaced and the pavements repaired.
